delete-account.title: Delete a Account
delete-account.description1: Are you sure you want to delete it?
delete-account.description2: The service is no longer available after you delete the account.

delete-feedback.title: Delete feedbacks
delete-feedback.description: Are you sure you want to delete all selected feedbacks?

delete-issue.title: Delete issues
delete-issue.description: Are you sure you want to delete all selected issues?

setting.title: Setting

sign-up-mgmt.domain-restriction-tooltip: You can set up the domain of the email that can be registered as a user.

setting.same-key: Input the same value as the key

field-mgmt.preview-caption: Preview is an example data to help you understand.
field-mgmt.preview-description: You can check it after selecting <preview>Preview</preview>.

delete-project.title: Delete Project
delete-project.description:
Deleting a project will delete all issue/feedback data.
Please enter the text below to proceed with the deletion.

delete-channel.title: Delete Channel
delete-channel.description:
Deleting a channel deletes all feedback data.
Please enter the text below to proceed with the deletion.

create-role.title: Create Role
create-role.description: Please enter a new Role Name.

edit-api-key.title: Edit API KEY
edit-api-key.description:
If you change the API KEY to inactive, the API for that KEY will not be available.
Please change the status to inactive only if you don't use API KEY.

delete-option.title: Delete Option
delete-option.description: It does not apply to options in previous feedback.

delete-role.title: Delete Role
delete-role.description:
Are you sure you want to delete Role?
Members with that Role will also disappear.

edit-member.title: Edit Member
edit-member.description:
Role varies from the menu accessible to functions available.
Please check the member and select the correct Role.

delete-member.title: Delete Member
delete-member.description: Are you sure you want to delete the Member?

create-project.title: Create Project
create-project.error-member: User information that does not currently exist.
create-project.continue-channel-creation:
UserFeedback must be created up to the Channel before UserFeedback is available.
Would you like to continue creating a channel?

create-channel.title: Create Channel
create-channel.finish-channel-creation:
Everything is ready.
Start Using UserFeedback!

date.date-range-over-max-days: The inquiry period can only be entered up to {{maxDays}} days

text.warning-get-out:
Will you leave the process of creating a {{type}}?
Even if you leave, you can proceed later.
text.create-channel-in-progress: There is a Channel being created.
text.create-project-in-progress: There is a Project being created.

continue.title: Do you want to continue?
continue.description: There is a {{type}} currently being created. Do you want to continue? (If you do it from scratch, the existing information disappears.)

total-feedback.title: Total number of feedbacks
total-feedback.description: Number of feedback created in a specific period of time. ({{targetDate}})

total-issue.title: Total number of issues
total-issue.description: Number of issues created in a specific period of time. ({{targetDate}})

issue-ratio.title: Register Issue rate
issue-ratio.description: Register Issue rate of feedback created in a specific period of time. ({{targetDate}})

today-feedback.title: Number of today's feedback
today-feedback.description:
Number of feedback created today. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

yesterday-feedback.title: Number of yesterday's feedback
yesterday-feedback.description:
Number of feedback created yesterday. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

n-days-feedback.title: Number of feedbacks in the last {{n}} days
n-days-feedback.description:
Number of feedback created in the last {{n}} days. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

today-issue.title: Number of today's issue
today-issue.description:
Number of issue created today. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

yesterday-issue.title: Number of yesterday's issue
yesterday-issue.description:
Number of issue created yesterday. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

n-days-issue.title: Number of issue in the last {{n}} days
n-days-issue.description:
Number of issue created in the last {{n}} days. ({{targetDate}})
The increase/decrease rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

feedback-trend.title: Feedback Trend
feedback-trend.description: Display the trend of feedback creation over a specific period of time.

issue-trend.title: Issue Trend
issue-trend.description: Display the trend of Issue creation over a specific period of time.

issue-status-count.title: Issue Status
issue-status-count.description: Display the current status of the entire issue.

issue-rank.title: Top Issue
issue-rank.description: Display the top issues with a large number of count.

issue-comparison.title: Issue comparison
issue-comparison.description: Compare and display the trend of feedback creation for selected issues.

select-issue.max-issue-count: You can choose up to five issues.

tooltip.issue-feedback-count: Number of feedbacks registered in the issue.

help-card.project-info: You can collect feedback on a project-by-project basis. Please register your Project information based on the product you want to manage your feedback on. (ex. Product Name)
help-card.role: You can set permissions to access and use the Project.
help-card.member: You can register or manage members to participate in the Project.
help-card.api-key: Manage API Key information in the feedback collection API. If you collect feedback using API, please generate Key information.
help-card.issue-tracker: UserFeedback feedback and Issue Tracking System can be linked and managed. Please enter your Issue Tracking System information.
help-card.channel-info: You can define the feedback fields that you want to collect through the Channel. Please register the Channel information considering the feedback path and personality. (ex. VOC, APP Reivew)
help-card.fields: Define the feedback fields that you want to collect with User Feedback according to the registered channel. Try pre-setting the fields you want to collect through the API or the fields you want to register directly from the ADMIN.
help-card.image-setting:
When collecting feedback on the Image format, you can work with Image Storage and set up a whitelist for the Image URL domain.
See Image <icon></icon> <docs>Docs</docs>.
help-card.field-preview: You can preview what the fields you set up in Field Management will look like. Previews are not real because they are shown as arbitrary data.

hint.image-format: The format for entering the Image URL.
